name: Crispy Soy Garlic Tofu

ingredients.ingredient: Oyster sauce or vegetarian stir-fry sauce

instructions: Dice extra-firm tofu and set aside.
Combine garlic, regular soy sauce, dark soy sauce, oyster sauce (or vegetarian stir-fry sauce), Shaoxing wine, sugar, rice vinegar, cornstarch, and water in a bowl.
Generously coat the tofu in cornstarch.
Over medium heat, add vegetable oil to a pan and add the coated tofu.
Fry tofu on both sides until crispy.
Remove tofu from pan and set aside.
Add the sauce to the pan and simmer to reduce.
Add the crispy tofu back to the pan.
Mix to coat the tofu evenly in the sauce.
Garnish with green onions and sesame seeds.
